title: Chilli tomato pizza and lobster calzone
description: This recipe makes enough dough for two pizzas and two lobster filled calzones. Take your pick! The dough is an authentic recipe from Naples. Leaving it to proove overnight in the fridge gives it an extra sourdough-like flavour.
ingredients: 200g/7oz semolina flour, plus extra for dusting
1 small cooked lobster, meat removed and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
